RelatedSentence: Russian troops , which took part in drills in three regions bordering Ukraine , have been ordered back to their bases .
The West has criticised Russia 's troop presence along the border as highly provocative .
The Kremlin released a statement on Monday saying that troops involved in planned spring exercises in the Rostov , Belgorod and Bryansk regions have been told to go back to their bases .
